channel.title: Trac on Fabrice Aneche
channel.description: Recent content in Trac on Fabrice Aneche

item.title: Use Trac source browser with Jira
item.description: Jira is a nice product for issue tracking linked to a SCM repository, yes it’s not free software but they provide a 5$ starter license for 5 users. But Jira lacks of a part that trac is doing very well, source browser, in facts Atlassian provides one: Fisheye but it’s really expensive Simply go to your Jira Administration, on the left click on Subversion Repositories (this menu appears after the installation of the subversion’s plugin).
